name: Dino Rush Race
description:
RUN. FLY. EAT. GO FASTER. WIN.
CREATE YOUR OWN LEVELS
Go faster than your opponents in this competitive racing game!

This is the sequel of 2010 critically acclaimed Dino Rush game

Eat fruits to keep your energy high and go faster.
Dodge obstacles, flying predators, and quicksand!
Use powerful boosters to get faster.

Defeat opponents from all over the word and break new world records.
Discover unique levels through the campaign map.

Want more? Create your own levels and share with others. Play the best levels our community created!

Don’t let your dino starve and eat fruits to be the fastest dino alive!


Features :
• 50 unique tracks, more to come!
• race against other players in a time trial
• race against top players to break world records
• powerful bonuses to power-up your dino
• 4 different characters to play with
• an ultra-intuitive level editor to create your own levels and share them with the community!
• 2 original soundtracks
• iPhone X ready User Interfaces
